title: Are These People Plagued By Evil? | EPP 305
description:
One person recalls the seemingly endless events that led him to believe he may have a dark attachment.Â 

What does one living tortured soul do to make peace with the never-ending barrage of spirits that follow her around?

If you have a true ghost story, share it with the top horror podcast around!

If you have a real ghost story or supernatural event to report, please write into our show or call 1-855-853-4802!
